title: tvOS 15.4 beta 2 for Apple TV brings captive Wi-Fi network support, tweaks to video player, more
content:
Apple is seeding today tvOS 15.4 beta 2 to Apple TV developers. Not only that, but the company is also releasing the second beta version of HomePod 15.4.

more…

The post tvOS 15.4 beta 2 for Apple TV brings captive Wi-Fi network support, tweaks to video player, more appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Apple is seeding tvOS 15.4 beta 2 to developers. Not only that, but the company is also releasing the second beta version of HomePod 15.4.
